message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.AI 

This paper deals with the design of an adaptive communication system for millimeter-wave vehicular networks, which involves the optimization of beam training, data transmission, and handover decisions based on the mobility and blockage dynamics of the users. This problem is related to several areas of computer science, including networked systems (cs.NI), information theory (cs.IT), control systems (cs.SY), multimedia (cs.MM), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper.
